text: Podsmreka pri Velikih Laščah () is a small settlement west of Velike Lašče in central Slovenia. The entire Municipality of Velike Lašče is part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Velike Lašče municipal site ==Name== The name of the settlement was changed from Podsmreka to Podsmreka pri Velikih Laščah in 1987.Spremembe naselij 1948–95. 1996. Database. Ljubljana: Geografski inštitut ZRC SAZU, DZS. ==Notable people== The Slovene writer Josip Stritar was born in the settlement in 1836. The house where he was born has been substantially remodeled, and a commemorative plaque with a relief portrait of the author was unveiled on it in 1936.Slovenian Ministry of Culture register of national heritage reference number ešd 5307 ==References== ==External links== *Podsmreka pri Velikih Laščah on Geopedia * Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Velike Lašče
title: Podsmreka pri Velikih Laščah
